titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend for one year the credit for energy-efficient existing homes.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend for one year the credit for energy-efficient existing homes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: This bill amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend through December 31, 2017, the income tax credit for nonbusiness energy property.
